overview: In the France of Louis XIII, the brave Muskehounds risk their lives for their king and their country fighting the ambitious Cardinal Richelieu who threatens the throne of France. Based on the famous novel by Alexandre Dumas' The Three Musketeers ". It is the story of Dogtanian, a young swordsman who achieves his dream of joining the royal guard by virtue of his courage, valor and cunning with the sword. A story based on true friendship and a motto worth fighting for: "One for All and All for
title: Dogtanian Special
